channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack G135B18
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 23, 00:00 - 02:00 UTC

Jun 3, 16:17 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our public and private networks (Vrack) in the rack G135B18.

Start time : 23/07/2025 00:00 UTC
End time : 23/07/2025 02:00 UTC
Service impact : Public and private networks (Vrack) will be temporarily unavailable for servers located in the specified rack during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [BHS5][Dedicated Servers] - Rack T05A31
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 21, 03:00 - 03:30 UTC

Jun 17, 23:02 UTC

Start time : 21/07/2025 03:00 UTC
End time : 21/07/2025 03:30 UTC
Service impact : Public and vRack networks will be temporarily unavailable during the maintenance for servers in rack T05A31.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [BHS2/BHS6][Storage] - Storage and Backups maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 14, 07:00 UTC  -  Jul 15, 16:00 UTC

Jun 23, 09:00 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Storage and Backups offer.

Start time : 14/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 15/07/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Lowered performance during maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will upgrade major version of block storage software to next stable release.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [SBG/RBX][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 10, 04:30 - 10:00 UTC

Jun 28, 01:03 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare Metal Cloud offer.

Start time : 10/07/2025 04:30 UTC
End time : 10/07/2025 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform an update on the storage servers hosting your data.
This version will improve certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.
During the maintenance period, your data will remain available.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - Racks G107A14/A15/A16
item.description:
Jun 30, 08:23 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering on the racks G107A14, G107A15 and G107A16.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 30/06/2025 08:14 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : All servers in the racks G107A14/A15/A16 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their servers located on the specified racks.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by an electrical equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
